session_info.name: MOXBA - Plenary Oral Session, Synchrotron Light Sources and FELs

papers.title: Challenges in the Design of Diffraction-limited Storage Rings
authors: This presentation reviews current developments in the design of ultra-low emittance lattices

the experience and challenges with the operation of low emittance lattices and the main technological problems. Beam dynamics issues and collective effects for ultra low emittance machines are also addressed.
